listener.name: Listener
listener.desc: A small, pocket-sized blue orb that is normally cool to the touch, but warms when your mysterious rescuer uses it to communicate with you. He/she told you to keep this safe, and let no one know of its true purpose.

note.name: Indecipherable Note
note.desc: A note covered in strange alien symbols. Your mysterious rescuer left this for you, saying it would help explain things, but so far you can't understand it.
